data.title: TLC HD and VH1 Classic join HD Austria
data.meta_description: Austrian DTH satellite platform HD Austria has taken two further TV channels onboard its portfolio. Women's channel TLC HD and music channel VH1 Classic are now part of the line-up satellite households in Austria can receive on Astra (19.2° East). TLC HD is transmitted on the frequency 10.964 GHz H (SR 22,000, FEC 2/3) while…
data.text:
Austrian DTH satellite platform HD Austria has taken two further TV channels onboard its portfolio.

Women’s channel TLC HD and music channel VH1 Classic are now part of the line-up satellite households in Austria can receive on Astra (19.2° East).

TLC HD is transmitted on the frequency 10.964 GHz H (SR 22,000, FEC 2/3) while VH1 Classic can be found on 11.739 GHz V (SR 27,500, FEC 3/4). In contrast to TLC HD, the music channel is only offered in SD resolution.

Related

Jörn reports on the latest developments in Germany, Austria and Switzerland. Since 1992, he has been working as a freelance journalist, specialised in digital media, broadcast technology, convergence and new markets. He also takes up University lectureships, writes articles in specialist publications, and produces radio reports. Jörn is also a moderator of panel discussions at industry events such as ANGA COM, Medientage München and IFA Berlin.
